entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who asks Moody if he found Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a teacher who has a wooden leg and uses a magical eye.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who asks if Mr. Crouch Disapparated.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who thinks about a career as an Auror and has a conversation with Moody.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a person who is missing and being searched for by Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: auror
entities.description: Auror is a career that Moody thinks Hermione would be good at.

relationships.description: Harry asks Moody if he found Mr. Crouch.
Ron speculates that Mr. Crouch might have Disapparated.
Hermione has a conversation with Moody about her potential career as an Auror.
Harry is searching for Mr. Crouch along with Ron and Hermione.
